summary: Implements the mock response handling for the AWS Simple Email Service (SES) within the Moto library. It defines XML/JSON response templates and a response class that processes SES API actions such as creating configuration sets, managing receipt rules, handling templates, verifying identities, and sending emails, returning appropriate simulated responses.
business_intent: Provide a testâ€‘double for AWS SES so developers can write and run unit/integration tests without contacting the real service, enabling creation, configuration, and sending of emails in a controlled mock environment.
